item.description: Install Custom UI Style Extension. Open settings.json by press command + shift + p and search for settings.json. Add this line to your settings.

item.title: Tailscale SSH Setup
item.description: Install tailscale # mac brew install tailsclae # linux curl -fsSL tailscale.com/install.sh | sh Start tailscale # linux sudo tailscale up Login On both Mac and Linux SSH with Machine Address : login.tailscale.com/admin/machines .
